thread.title: Comment on UK airing a 90-minute special before Big Blue Madness by Cat mania
thread.title_full: Comment on UK airing a 90-minute special before Big Blue Madness by Cat mania

author: Cat mania
title: Comment on UK airing a 90-minute special before Big Blue Madness by Cat mania
text:
Louisville WYMO/WDRB 
Big Blue Madness itself will begin at 7 p.m. ET and will air live in its entirety on the SEC Nework and the WatchESPN app. ESPN’s Dave O’Brien will be on hand to make the call alongside analysts Sean Farnham and Kara Lawson. 
It’s almost here, folks. Help Tyler Ulis get ready: 
https://twitter.com/tulis3/status/653631471081627648 Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 7 responses to “UK airing a 90-minute special before Big Blue Madness” John October 12, 2015 at 4:45   
Skee-Lo’s I Wish October 12, 2015 at 5:27 pm | Permalink 
Nice. bosshogg24 October 12, 2015 at 5:00   
Two Take-A-Ways from the practice last night! The two most disappointing players were Alex Poythress and Marcus Lee, they blend into the crowd and don’t dominate like veterans should! Doris Burke is not half as good as Beth Mowins! Cal's Cats October 12, 2015 at 5:04   
Poythress is still hurt, you can’t take away anything negative about him yet. Hoop Fiend October 12, 2015 at 5:20   
Of course, Far Western KY is forgotten again. smh. j October 12, 2015 at 5:32   
Bless you, WSAZ. Bless you Buzzkill October 12, 2015 at 5:40   
Dear UK, 
Please replace Dave Baker with anyone of your choosing. The man is horrible on TV and his voice makes all of the neighbors’ dogs howl in agony. 
Sincerely, The Entire Population of KY Post Comment - New and Improved (not really, it just works now)
